support.title: B2B Support
support.description: Fill out the form below to get help with your Husqvarna products. We will get back to you within 2-3 business days.
support.technicalDesc: Product issues, installation or technical questions
support.customerDesc: Questions about orders, deliveries or invoices
support.productInfoNote: Enter either PNC number or serial number to help us identify your product.
support.subject: Subject
support.problemPlaceholder: Describe your problem or question in as much detail as possible...
support.attachmentsNote: Upload relevant files (PDF, Word, images). Max 10MB per file.
support.uploadPrompt: Click to upload files or drag and drop
support.customerValidationRequired: Please verify that the customer number is valid before submitting

validation.problemDescriptionMinLength: Problem description must be at least 10 characters
validation.pncOrSerialRequired: For technical support, either PNC number or serial number is required

errors.networkError: Cannot connect to the server. Please check your internet connection or try again later.

form.success: Form submitted successfully! We will get back to you within 2-3 business days.
form.error: An error occurred while submitting the form. Please try again.
